abstract: Major stock indexes ended mixed Tuesday, a day after the Dow Jones industrials soared more than 150 points on upbeat manufacturing reports in the United States and China. Uncertainty over crucial reports this week on employment and the service industry also kept buyers at bay.
snippet: Major stock indexes ended mixed Tuesday, a day after the Dow Jones industrials soared more than 150 points on upbeat manufacturing reports in the United States and China. Uncertainty over crucial reports this week on employment and the service ind...
lead_paragraph: Major stock indexes ended mixed Tuesday, a day after the Dow Jones industrials soared more than 150 points on upbeat manufacturing reports in the United States and China. Uncertainty over crucial reports this week on employment and the service industry also kept buyers at bay, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Wall St. Ends Mixed on Sliding Home Sales
